column1: You never give up and find it difficult to change your mind or course in mid-stream.
Whatever you have set your sights on, you refuse to give up or let go of it.
You are patient and usually slow to anger unless someone takes you too far.
You are reliable and consistent and can handle more of the workload than most around you.
You prefer a regular routine, with definite hours and clearly defined responsibilities and tasks.
You enjoy building and seeing the results of your hard work.
Keeping things going is your strength, especially once someone else starts them.
Money and possessions are important to you for the feelings of security they bring.
You are handy with your hands and may be ambidextrous or mechanically inclined.
Debate and argument appeal to you.
You grasp concepts easily and may become impatient with those who don't learn as quickly.
You are very direct in thought, action, and speech and everyone knows how you feel.
You are adventurous, courageous, and independent.
You tend to be industrious, efficient, practical, exacting, scientific, organized, shy, thrifty, studious, economical, and punctual.
You have common sense and the ability to manage others, but may be a bit of a perfectionist.
Your mind is deep and analytical and you probably have a good head for numbers.
Your work is usually neat and orderly and you dislike messes and dirt.
You tend to be idealistic, optimistic, dependable, open-minded, friendly, honest and versatile.
You are usually outspoken, sometimes to the point of bluntness.
You are quiet, shy, sensitive, sentimental, gentle, and romantic.
